p: Working stocks of SFTSV were generated in a Vero E6 cell line by infecting at a low multiplicity of infection and harvesting the cell culture medium 7 d p.i. In vitro experiments with SFTSV conducted in the United Kingdom were performed under containment level 3 conditions, approved by the UK Health and Safety Executive. In Korea, viruses were handled in an enhanced biosafety level 3 containment laboratory as approved by the Korean Centres for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC-14-3-07).
